title: Eclair. Episode 03
creator_credit: Pat McLagan, Alma Gray, David Ash and ILEA
brief_description: The series “Eclair” features Ted, a rather confused and naive Englishman and a pair of mischievous French adolescent twins. The theme of this film is: “Food and drink - Asking for food and drinks in a cafe or restaurant” using names of food and drinks, and expression of hunger, thirst, likes and dislikes.
